features: GET CREAMY FROTH IN SECONDS: PowerLix brings you its small portable handheld milk frother with stand for making delicious homemade lattes, macchiato, frappe, matcha and more. If you love your morning coffee with rich froth and foam, then you certainly want to have PowerLix milk frother handheld frothing wand at home. This electric whisk hand frother is equipped with 19000 RPM highly powered motor to fill your cup with café style professional finishing froth in 20 seconds.

MORE THAN COFFEE FROTHER HANDHELD: In additional to coffee whisk frother or coffee stirrers electric, our hand frother is a perfect handheld mixer for your mixing needs, your essential helper to blend protein powder, shakes and smoothies, as protein shake mixer, or whisking egg and and sauces. This hand mixer electric handheld can make milk shakes for your kids or cocktails for your friends, making this mini mixer an econonical choice and multifunctional kitchen essential as coffee mixer wand.

PREMIUM QUALITY, EASY TO CLEAN: Our milk foamer, mixer electric handheld and drink stirrer combined is made of food grade ABS stainless steel with high durability, resistance to corrosion and staining. Our high speed engine delivers double power of other hand mixer and professional espresso makers. Its ergonomic handle and power button are comfortable, steady to hold. Cleanup of mixer blender is even easier - put the whisk in water and turn it on. Please avoid immersing the engine in water.

VERSATILE SIMPLE TO USE: This efficient drink frother handheld and hand blender works well on all types of milk - soy, almond, cashew, hazelnut, oat, whole milk or low fat milk, not just frother for coffee. Electric mixer's lightweight, perfetc size ensure comfort and convenience to hold on different angles, easily stored and carried while traveling. Powered by 2 AA batteries, it's cordless so you don't need to find sockets, delicately designed to fit into kitchen with any kitchen accessories.

AFTER SERVICE LIFETIME WARRANTY: Our US-based customer service means that you can trust that if not satisfied for any reason, you can get a hassle-free refund or replacement. Don't hesitant to reach out if you have any questions. We are confident of our hand held frother and know you will like it. This is why we back up our electric frother with after service warranty, and the amazing free bonus ebook is yours to keep. Order now and start to create thick and creamy foam for your homemade drinks!

Who Are We? Powerlix is founded by a family of the best chefs, nutritionists, photographers, and filmmakers whose purpose is to make the life of everyone entering the kitchen easier and bring a fun cook attitude by saving time and cooking struggles though the indigenous development of modern kitchen accessories. Powerlix's small, portable handheld milk frother is a lovely friend and an economical and sustainable option to help you create your favorite drinks at home whenever you need.

Mix Matcha powders Turmeric Superfood or Eggs Next page 1 Cocktails 2 Smoothies 3 Beverages 4 More

All Milk Types of Your Choice Powerlix Milk Frother makes delicious creamy froth for all types of milk: Whole MilkLow Fat MilkAlmond, Soy, Oat, Cashew, HazelnutOther dairy products Foamy Froth in 20 Seconds Have the professional finishing touch to your Latte, Cappuccino, Macchiato, Matcha Green Tea, Hot Cocoa, or iced Coffee without a trip to Coffee Shop. Easy to Hold, Timeless Quality Designed agronomically with a durable compact handle, Powerlix Milk Frother is made to fit in your palm comfortably and controlled steadily. We Want to Make You Smile! We're always happy to help find the solution for your needs, as we're passionate about our products as well as our customers.

What types of milk work the best for Powerlix Milk Frother? Feel free to choose whichever kind of milk you prefer - fat free, low fat, or non-dairy milk like almond milk, soy milk, oat milk, or any combinations! What additional cool tasks can this milk frother do? Mix powders to create a variety of food, like Matcha tea and turmeric superfoods, or even eggs! Is this milk frother quiet? Yes, it is very quiet and only has a light whirring sound when frothing. How to change battery? Battery replacement is user-friendly. Just press the small tab to open the battery compartment and pull the ribbon for the battery to pop out. What if my Powerlix milk frother doesn't work? No worries, we make sure your concerns are taken care of. Please give your questions requests via buyer messages so that we'll resolve for you. Just go to Returns & Orders - locate the order - click Ask Product Question - write your message to us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The PowerLix Powerful Handheld Milk Frother has become my secret weapon for achieving barista-worthy drinks right at home. This battery-operated foam maker has truly transformed my morning routine, adding a touch of luxury and indulgence to every cup.What truly stands out about the PowerLix frother is its sheer power. The frother's motor generates a whirlwind of fine bubbles that effortlessly transform ordinary milk into velvety, creamy foam. This foam isn't just visually appealing – it enhances the taste and texture of my beverages, making each sip a delightful experience.I love the convenience of the battery operation. It's a breeze to use without worrying about cords or finding an outlet. The frother's performance is consistently impressive, even with regular use. The battery life is surprisingly long-lasting, which means I don't have to worry about replacements too frequently.The included stand is a thoughtful addition. It keeps the frother within easy reach while also preventing it from getting lost in the kitchen drawer chaos. The sleek design of the stand adds a touch of elegance to my countertop, giving the whole setup a professional feel.Cleaning the PowerLix frother is hassle-free. The stainless steel whisk is easy to detach and clean, either by hand or in the dishwasher. This simple maintenance routine ensures that the frother is always ready for action, whenever the craving for a foamy treat strikes.From lattes to cappuccinos and even matcha lattes, the PowerLix Powerful Handheld Milk Frother consistently delivers outstanding results. It's become an essential part of my daily routine, adding that extra layer of enjoyment to my beverages. If you're a fan of coffee shop-quality drinks in the comfort of your home, I highly recommend the PowerLix frother – it's a game-changer that's sure to elevate your drink experience to new heights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow what a powerful lil mixer!
reviews.reviewText: Love how fast and powerful this lil mixer works! Used it in cup of cacao with cream .. it mixes fast and will get the drink going in a FAST little volcano that could spin out of your mug if you have it too full. I LOVE how foamy it makes makes my drink

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best kitchen device ever
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Works a long time before battery needs to be replaced - I use it everyday and it lasts 2+ months. Froths and mixes really well. Is portable and cleans easily! (I always give them as gifts now - people don't know what they're missing.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No Customer Support - Resolved
reviews.reviewText: This item works good when it is working. It is easy to clean. Then the item quit working. The problem is support from PowerLix. I went to their support page, and left all my information including the problem with the unit that quit working, on September 17th, 2023. I tried e-mailing their support, but received an e-mail that the mailbox was full. To this date, I still have not heard from the company.PowerLix reached out to me after this review and solved the original problem with the old unit and did replace it with a new item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This makes blending cacao powder, into my morning mocha latte, very easy. This gadget is fantastic and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update: Worked great then stopped working, company sent new
reviews.reviewText: Update: I contacted the company through Amazon and they sent me a new mixer without charge. It came within 2 days and it works without any issue. Customer service was very easy to work with. I changed my rating from 2-5 stars.This little mixer worked amazing for the first 2 weeks. I used it once a day to mix my protein shake. Then it started to slow down, so I changed out the batteries. Then the button on the top stopped working so now it’s useless. I would give it 5 stars if it worked how it did fresh out the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best milk frother!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product because my old milk frother (which a friend gifted to me) had an accident and got broken after 5 years of function. I decided to buy this one because of all the good reviews and the price. All can I say is that it worth it! I love how easy it is to turn it on and make the best frothered milk. I also like the design and the support. I read that you can also use it in eggs, which I haven't tried, but I'll do it soon.It's super easy to clean.I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy for mixing instant breakfast and Metamucil
reviews.reviewText: Work great with Metamucil and very easy to clean. I only wish it was rechargeable. The stand is excellent. Overall excellent value.
Use this every morning with my coffee. It works great, powerful, easy to clean. Comes with the stand which is perfect.
Funciona perfecto y es muy util tenerlo a mano en la cocina. Es potente y facil de limpiar

Als mein Milchaufschäumer kaputt ging, versuchte ich diesen kleinen elektrischen Handquirl - und ich bin überrascht und begeistert wieviel das kleine Ding kann bei dem Preis. Er schäumt Milch (normale Milch, Hafermilch, Mandelmilch, etc.) schnell und perfekt auf. Selbst Eigelb kann man damit schlagen. Auch super für Matcha-Tee. Zu reinigen ist er super einfach (im Vergleich zum Milchaufschäumsystem der Kaffeemaschine), einfach Spitze unter Wasser halten. Platzsparend ist er auch. Echt ein super Gerät!
Color vibranteSoporte : un aciertoFuncionamiento: sencillo. Manejable. Muy bueno. Espuma abundantemente. No pesa. Se lava muy bien. CómodoResumen: encantados con este nuevo “juguete”

The media could not be loaded. Questo dispositivo, alimentato da una singola batteria AA, stupisce per la sua potenza di 19000rpm, miscela ottimamente in soli 15-20 secondi. La funzione di accelerazione lenta è un vero punto di forza, prevenendo fastidiosi schizzi di latte e rendendo il suo uso un vero piacere. L'aggiunta del supporto in acciaio inossidabile è non solo pratica per riporre il frullino, ma aggiunge anche un tocco di eleganza alla cucina.☕ Schiuma perfetta in meno di 20 secondi⚡ Funzione di accelerazione lenta per evitare schizzi🛠️ Supporto in acciaio inossidabile per una facile conservazione⚠️ Richiede l'acquisto separato di batteria AA🔄 Mi impegno a tenere aggiornata questa recensione in caso di novità o cambiamenti nel tempo. Al momento, non ho ulteriori osservazioni su questo prodotto.
